error_minimalBalanceAtNodeAddressIsRequi: A minimal balance of 1 {{name}} at the 'Node Address' is required in order to register as a guardian.
error_nodeAddressCannotBeTheSameAsGuardi: Your Orbs node address cannot be the same as your Guardian address {{guardianAddress}}
You_need_to_register_on_both:
You must register on {{requiredNetwork}}. 
 {{optionalNetwork}} is optional but failing to register will not allow delegation on {{optionalNetwork}}
this_transaction_will_register_you_on: This transaction will register you on {{network}}
